item.title: Michael Widner on "What hardware and software would you put in a DH/Multimedia lab?"
item.dc:creator: Michael Widner
item.description:
If you could build your own DH lab, what would you stock it with? Anything from AV equipment to software to computer hardware is fair game. I'm envisioning a place where graduate students (mainly) and others would have the space and tools to experiment, learn, and do research and/or produce media.

Aside: I notice there's not a category in DHAnswers for these sorts of infrastructure questions.
